mapper.sql:
from clotheInfo as a left join betterBlog as b on b.seq = a.betterBlog_seq where 1=1 AND a.ifDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND a.seq = #{shValue} AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.item LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.itemBrand LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
select a.seq, a.item, a.buyLink, a.infoPrice, a.itemBrand, a.betterBlog_seq, a.ifDelNy, b.title
order by a.seq desc limit #{startRnumForMysql},#{rowNumToShow}
select a.seq, a.item, a.buyLink, a.infoPrice, a.itemBrand, a.betterBlog_seq, a.ifDelNy, b.title from clotheInfo as a left join betterBlog as b on b.seq = a.betterBlog_seq where 1=1 and a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update clotheInfo set item = #{item}, buyLink = #{buyLink}, infoPrice = #{infoPrice}, itemBrand = #{itemBrand}, betterBlog_seq = #{betterBlog_seq} where 1=1 and seq = #{seq}
